lines.text: You're just a shit-stain on the panties of life.
You should know, you lick 'em every night!
Keep your fingers above the sheets. We only change 'em once a week!
I liked the way you took on Charlie today. Ain't many fish that would fuck with Chuck.
I didn't know who I was messing with. Seems like Charlie and Edna have an understanding.
Yeah. Charlie's under and Edna's standing.
You know the name of the game, girls... control. COMPLETE... control.
The last thing this dorm needs is another pussy.
My name is Edna but some of the girls call me Eddy, after they get to know me better.
I want this bullshit stopped, and I want it stopped now. You're losing your charisma, Edna. You're too easy. It's time you put on your "fuck you" boots and start kicking!
My girls won't step out of line anymore, Sutter. I promise you that.
